contest-event.event-date:
June 17, 1995 D Northeastern Brass Band Championships
Northeastern Brass Band Championships 0 Set Test and Own Choice
northeastern-brass-band-competition
First contest 1994; final scheduled contest 1996. United States of America
Rhapsody in Brass
United States Military Academy (Eisenhower Hall), West Point, New York, USA Second annual event organised by Mark Freeh and Mike Orfitelli.
4 bands competed. 3 adjudicators. Bands to play a 25 minute programme including the set test piece.
Oct. 13, 2014, 7:54 p.m. Nov. 18, 2014, 11:41 a.m.
1 Imperial Brass Patrick Burns Blenheim Flourishes
2 Atlantic Brass Band Anthony Guerere
3 New England Brass Band Bill Rollins
4 Danbury Brass Band Alan Raph
